text: Ezɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God kamaghɨn Aisaia mɨgei, “Nɨ uan otarim Searjasup inigh gua mangɨ Atrivim Ahas batoghsɨ, Mozir Dɨpar Pɨn Itimɨn daghurimɨn mavanang, dɨpar kam a uaghira Jerusalemɨn otifi. Egh gua mangɨ tuavir ekiar ghua iniba ruer danganimɨn boroghɨn ikɨ, atrivim batogham.7:3 Hibrun akamɨn, ziam Searjasup an mɨngarim an mɨrara ghu, “Gumazamizir varazira uamategh izam.”
